original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
translated: Non-arising is also not one thing,🔽and meditative stabilization another.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: Meditative stabilization is also non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: by this approach

original: gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: what are called ‘meditative stabilizations’ are an uncountable number of non-dual things.

original: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: In this way, doors of dhāraṇī are not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and non-arising another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
translated: Non-arising is also doors of dhāraṇī,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and doors of dhāraṇī are also non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: by this approach what are called ‘doors of dhāraṇī’ are an uncountable number of non-dual things.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: In this way, the powers of the tathāgatas are not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and non-arising another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams /
translated: nonarising is the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and the powers of the tathāgatas are nonarising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //🔽'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: for this reason what is called ‘the powers of the tathāgatas’ is a description of the principle of nonduality.🔽“It is not the case, Venerable Śāradvatīputra, that fearlessness is one thing and nonarising another,🔽for nonarising is not one thing and fearlessness another.

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma @303a *// skyes pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma @303a *// skyes pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams /
translated: Nonarising is fearlessness,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and fearlessness is nonarising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //🔽'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: for this reason what is called ‘fearlessness’ is a description of the principle of nonduality.

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: “It is not the case, Venerable Śāradvatīputra, that the detailed and thorough knowledges are one thing and nonarising another,🔽for nonarising is not one thing and the detailed and thorough knowledges another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams /
translated: The nonarising is also the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are also nonarising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: for that reason this—namely, the detailed and thorough knowledges—is made into one single group.

original: 'di ltar byams pa chen po'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar byams pa chen po'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: It is like this: the great love is not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po /
translated: and the nonarising another;🔽the nonarising is the great love,

original: byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and the great love is the nonarising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di byams pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di byams pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: for that reason this—namely, the great love—is made into one single group.

original: 'di ltar snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: It is like this: the great compassion is not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and the nonarising another;

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po /
translated: the nonarising is the great compassion,🔽and the great compassion is the nonarising.

original: snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: Great compassion itself is also non-arisen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: for this reason, what is called ‘great compassion’ is made into an enumeration of non-duality.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma @303b yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma @303b yin /
translated: In this way, the distinct qualities of the Buddha are not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and non-arising is not another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
translated: Non-arising itself is the distinct qualities of the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and the distinct qualities of the Buddha are non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: for this reason, what is called ‘the distinct qualities of the Buddha’ is made into an enumeration of non-duality.

original: 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: In this way, the result of stream enterer is not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and non-arising is not another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu /
translated: non-arising is the fruit of stream-­winning,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and the fruit of stream-­winning is non-­arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //🔽'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: for this reason this so-­called “fruit of stream-­winning” is reckoned as non-­dual.

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the fruit of the oncereturner is one thing and non-­arising another,

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
translated: for non-­arising is the fruit of the oncereturner,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: and the fruit of the oncereturner is non-­arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: for this reason this so-­called “fruit of the oncereturner” is reckoned as non-­dual.🔽It is not the case that the fruit of non-­returning is one thing and non-­arising another,🔽for non-­arising is the fruit of non-­returning,

original: 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the fruit of non-­returning is non-­arising.🔽Venerable Śāriputra,🔽for this reason this so-­called “fruit of non-­returning” is reckoned as non-­dual.

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
translated: Non-arising is also not one thing, and the fruit of non-returning another.🔽Non-arising itself is the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: The fruit of non-returning itself is also non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su @304a *//
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su @304a *//
translated: by this approach, what is called the fruit of non-returning is made into an unpaired number.

original: byas pa'o // 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byas pa'o // 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and non-arising another.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid /

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: by this approach, what is called arhatship is made into an unpaired number.

original: 'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: In this way, individual enlightenment is also not one thing,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub /

analyzed: rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang 'di rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the emptiness of all things is non-arising.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics is non-arising,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-arising,🔽the emptiness of non-entities is non-arising,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is non-arising,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is non-arising.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang skye ba med la /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang skye ba med la /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-arising,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the right efforts are non-arising,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba med /🔽dbang po rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba med / dbang po rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are non-arising,🔽the faculties are non-arising,

original: stobs rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the powers are non-arising,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the branches of awakening are non-arising,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: and the noble eightfold path is non-arising.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba med la /🔽bsam gtan rnams kyang @312a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba med la / bsam gtan rnams kyang @312a *//
translated: The noble truths are non-arising,

original: skye ba med /
analyzed: skye ba med /
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-arising,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the immeasurables are non-arising,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the formless absorptions are non-arising,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the aspects of liberation are non-arising,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang skye ba med /
translated: the nine serial absorptions are non-arising,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are non-arising,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the clairvoyances are non-arising,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the meditative stabilizations are non-arising,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are non-arising,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are non-arising,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang skye ba med /
translated: the fearlessnesses are non-arising,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang skye ba med /🔽byams pa chen po'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang skye ba med / byams pa chen po'ang skye ba med /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are non-arising,🔽great love is non-arising,

original: snying rje chen po'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang skye ba med /
translated: great compassion is non-arising,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-arising.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med la /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med la /
translated: Omniscience is non-arising,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med /
translated: the knowledge of the aspects of the path is non-arising, and the knowledge of all aspects is also non-arising.

original: so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med la /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med la /
translated: An ordinary being is also non-arising,

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of an ordinary being are also non-arising.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: An enterer to the stream is also non-arising,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of an enterer to the stream are also non-arising.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang skye ba med /
translated: A once-returner is also non-arising,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of a once-returner are also non-arising.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'ang skye ba med /
translated: A non-returner is also non-arising,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of a non-returner are also non-arising.

original: dgra bcom pa'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'ang skye ba med /
translated: A foe-destroyer is also non-arising,

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of a foe-destroyer are also non-arising.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba @312b med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba @312b med /
translated: A solitary realizer is also non-arising,🔽and the qualities of a solitary realizer are also non-arising.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med /
translated: A bodhisattva is also non-arising,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: and the qualities of a bodhisattva are also non-arising.

original: sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med /
translated: A buddha is also non-arising,🔽and the qualities of a buddha are also non-arising.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni /
translated: If the qualities of the Buddha are also unarisen,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: then those who follow the Śrāvaka Vehicle

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: would have already attained the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and arhatship.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
translated: Those who follow the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle would have already attained the awakening of a pratyekabuddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro //🔽'gro ba lnga rnams kyang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro // 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang /
translated: And bodhisattva great beings would have already attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
analyzed: tha mi dad par 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
translated: The five kinds of beings would also be indistinguishable.

original: byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And bodhisattva great beings would have already attained the five kinds of awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na /
translated: if all phenomena are unarisen,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it that

original: rgyun du zhugs pas ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pas ni /
translated: The stream-enterers cultivate the path

original: kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the three fetters.🔽The once-returners cultivate the path

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to reduce attachment, aversion, and delusion.

original: phyir mi 'ong bas ni /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bas ni /
translated: The nonreturners cultivate the path

original: dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the five fetters associated with the lower realms.🔽The arhats cultivate the path

original: dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the five fetters associated with the higher realms.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni /
translated: Those who have entered the vehicle of the solitary buddhas

original: rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms /
translated: cultivate the path for the sake of their own awakening.

original: ci'i phyir na /🔽byang chub sems @313a *//
analyzed: ci'i phyir na / byang chub sems @313a *//
translated: Why is it so?

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings

original: sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod /
translated: experience such suffering and undergo hardship for the sake of sentient beings.

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
translated: The Thus-Gone One

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
translated: and fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
translated: The Tathāgata

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
translated: turned the wheel of the Dharma.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: When that had been said, the venerable Subhūti

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is attainment or comprehension of a non-arisen dharma.

original: ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is a stream enterer in the non-arisen,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: nor do I assert that there is the result of stream enterer.

original: ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is a once-returner in the non-arisen,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: nor do I assert that there is the result of a once-returner.

original: ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that there is a non-returner in the non-arisen,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do /
translated: I do not accept that there is a fruit of non-returning.

original: ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that there is an arhat who is not born.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do //🔽ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do // ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that there is a realization of arhatship.🔽I do not accept that there is a pratyekabuddha who is not born.

original: rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that there is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice difficult conduct.

original: byang @313b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do //
analyzed: byang @313b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do //
translated: Bodhisattva mahāsattvas do not practice with the perception of difficult conduct.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na /
translated: if one generates the perception of suffering,

original: sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi /
analyzed: sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi /
translated: one will be unable to benefit immeasurable, innumerable sentient beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas /
analyzed: sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas /
translated: “They are able to benefit countless, limitless sentient beings by generating the perception of all sentient beings as their mother, generating the perception of all sentient beings as their father, generating the perception of all sentient beings as their child, and generating the perception of all sentient beings as themselves.

original: sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: “They are able to benefit countless, limitless sentient beings by generating the perception of all sentient beings as their mother, generating the perception of all sentient beings as their father, generating the perception of all sentient beings as their child, and generating the perception of all sentient beings as themselves.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings generate the following thought:

original: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya'ang /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya'ang /
translated: ‘Just as I am called “self,”

original: de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa /
analyzed: de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa /
translated: that is completely nonexistent and non-apprehensible in every way.

original: de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang 'du shes bskyed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang 'du shes bskyed de /
translated: In the same way, I will generate the perception of all outer and inner phenomena.

original: de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do //
translated: Even though I generate that perception, I will not generate the perception of hardship.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not grasp at or apprehend any phenomenon.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni ma skyes pa la /
analyzed: bdag ni ma skyes pa la /
translated: I am unborn,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod /
translated: They do not assert the existence of a Tathāgata.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod do /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod do / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am /
translated: They do not assert the existence of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'thob par bya ba mi 'dod do //
analyzed: 'thob par bya ba mi 'dod do //
translated: According to the Tathāgata’s turning of the wheel of the Dharma, they do not assert that something that is not produced is obtained or is to be obtained.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas thob pa dang / 'thob par bya @314a *//🔽bar 'dod dam /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas thob pa dang / 'thob par bya @314a *// bar 'dod dam /
translated: Subhūti, do you assert that something produced is obtained or is to be obtained,

original: 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod /
analyzed: 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod /
translated: or do you assert that something not produced is obtained?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽I do not assert that something produced is obtained,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: and I do not assert that something not produced is obtained.”🔽Śāradvatīputra said,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: 'o na 'thob pa med pa la mngon par rtogs pa med dam /
analyzed: 'o na 'thob pa med pa la mngon par rtogs pa med dam /
translated: then is there no realization of what is not obtained?”🔽Subhūti replied,

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhuti replied:🔽🔽

analyzed: sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste / don dam par ni 'thob pa'am /

original: mngon par rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'am /

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /

analyzed: sangs rgyas su gdags pa med do //

analyzed: bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the emptiness of the unconditioned is produced, that it is not produced, that it is both produced and not produced, or that it is neither produced nor not produced.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //

analyzed: bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the emptiness of specific characteristics is produced and arises as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the emptiness of non-apprehension is produced and arises as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the emptiness of non-things is produced and arises as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ni ngo @323a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ni ngo @323a *//

analyzed: bo nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skyes bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the emptiness of essential nature is produced and arises as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skyed pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar ma'i 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is produced and arises as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the applications of mindfulness are produced and arise as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the bases of spiritual power, when born, are essentially empty and born.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyi stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyi stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the faculties, when born, are essentially empty and born.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the powers, when born, are essentially empty and born.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the branches of awakening, when born, are essentially empty and born.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the noble eightfold path, when born, is essentially empty and born.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the noble truths arise, that they arise essentially.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa @323b skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa @323b skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the meditative stabilizations arise, that they arise essentially.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni tshad med pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni tshad med pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the immeasurables arise, that they arise essentially.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the formless absorptions arise, that they arise essentially.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the liberations arise, that they arise essentially.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the formless absorptions arise, being produced and empty of inherent nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the emptiness gate to liberation, the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation arise, being produced and empty of inherent nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the higher cognitions arise, being produced and empty of inherent nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the meditative stabilizations arise, being produced and empty of inherent nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the dhāraṇī gateways arise, being produced and empty of inherent nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the powers of the tathāgatas, which are produced, are produced as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the fearlessnesses, which are produced, are produced as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @324a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @324a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ti'i bu / bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ti'i bu / bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the detailed and thorough knowledges, which are produced, are produced as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni byams pa chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni byams pa chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that great love, which is produced, is produced as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that great compassion, which is produced, is produced as essentially empty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not maintain that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha that have arisen are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not maintain that the result of stream enterer that has arisen is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not maintain that the result of once-returner that has arisen is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, I do not maintain that the result of non-returner that has arisen is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not maintain that the state of a worthy one that has arisen is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the production of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that the production of the knowledge of the aspects of the path is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,🔽I do not consider that the production of the knowledge of all aspects is empty of an intrinsic nature.”

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod @324b do; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod @324b do; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra then asked,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: skye ba skye'am /
analyzed: skye ba skye'am /
translated: is production produced,

original: 'on tam mi skye ba skye /
analyzed: 'on tam mi skye ba skye /
translated: or is non-production produced?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: skye ba'ang mi skye /
analyzed: skye ba'ang mi skye /
translated: production is not produced,

original: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: and non-production is not produced.🔽If you ask why, Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: it is because

original: 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: In this way, both phenomena—that which arises and that which does not arise—are neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: They are formless, invisible, and non-reactive.🔽In this way, they are of a single identity in being identityless.

original: de ltar rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye /
analyzed: de ltar rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, for these reasons, arising does not give rise to arising.

original: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //
translated: Non-arising does not give rise to non-arising.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāradvatīputra then said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na /
translated: you have eloquently expressed the term ‘unborn phenomena.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram /
translated: will you also eloquently express the non-arising of unborn phenomena?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni /
translated: You have the courage to say that an unarisen phenomenon is an unarisen phenomenon.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa med do //
translated: I do not have the courage to say that an unarisen phenomenon is an unarisen phenomenon.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang bdag gis ni brjod par spobs pa med de /
analyzed: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang bdag gis ni brjod par spobs pa med de /
translated: I do not have the courage to say that the non-arising of unarisen phenomena

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: is so. And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa @325a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa @325a *//
translated: it is because the unarisen phenomena, the non-arising, the courage,

original: gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the expression, and the non-arising—all these phenomena are neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: they are formless, undefinable, and unimpeded;

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go /

original: smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de de bzhin te /

analyzed: brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o //

original: spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o //

original: chos ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni ma skyes pa'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: snying rje chen po skye ba med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do //

translated: The signless meditative stabilization is non-arising.🔽The wishless meditative stabilization is non-arising.🔽The emptiness meditative stabilization is non-arising.

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med do //

original: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med do //
translated: The wishless meditative stabilization is non-arising.🔽The emptiness meditative stabilization is non-arising.

original: rang byang chub skye ba med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub skye ba med do //
translated: The signless meditative stabilization is non-arising

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba med do //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste /

original: spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med do //
analyzed: spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med do //
translated: eloquence is non-arising, and phenomena are non-arising.

original: gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o //

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do //

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos @327a *//
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos @327a *//
translated: the Blessed One’s hearers

original: thams cad la gnas pa med pa dag gi chos nyid de /
analyzed: thams cad la gnas pa med pa dag gi chos nyid de /

original: de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do //
translated: They are unimpeded in whatever they are asked about.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all dharmas do not stand.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: ji ltar na chos thams cad mi gnas pa yin /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos thams cad mi gnas pa yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /

original: de ni nang na'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: de ni nang na'ang mi gnas /

original: phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /

original: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: 'du shes yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
