original: 'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should purify volitional factors.

original: @334b rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽mig yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: @334b rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // mig yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should purify consciousness.🔽They should purify the eyes.

original: rna ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sna yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sna yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should purify the ears.🔽They should purify the nose.

original: lce yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽lus yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lce yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // lus yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should purify the tongue.🔽They should purify the body.

original: yid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should purify the mind.

original: gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sgra yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sgra yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “One should purify form.🔽One should purify sound.

original: dri yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽ro yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dri yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // ro yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify smell.🔽One should purify taste.

original: reg yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: reg yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify touch.

original: chos yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “One should purify visual consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify auditory consciousness.🔽One should purify olfactory consciousness.🔽One should purify gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify tactile consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “One should purify visual contact.🔽One should purify auditory contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: One should purify olfactory contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “You should purify the composite of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the composite of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the composite of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of eye contact.🔽You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of ear contact.🔽You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of tongue contact.

original: lus @335a *// kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus @335a *// kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sa'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sa'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of mind contact.🔽You should purify the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should purify the water element.

original: me'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽rlung gi khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: me'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // rlung gi khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the fire element should be purified,🔽the wind element should be purified,

original: nam mkha'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the space element should be purified,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: and the consciousness element should be purified.

original: ma rig pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Ignorance should be purified,

original: 'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: volitional factors should be purified,

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: consciousness should be purified,

original: ming dang gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: name and form should be purified,

original: skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the six sense sources should be purified,

original: reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: contact should be purified,

original: tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽sred pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // sred pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: feeling should be purified,🔽craving should be purified,

original: len pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽srid pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: len pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // srid pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: grasping should be purified,🔽becoming should be purified,

original: skye ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: birth should be purified,

original: rga shi yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rga shi yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: and aging and death should be purified.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity should be purified,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “You should train in the perfection of morality.🔽You should train in the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽You should train in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in outer emptiness.

original: phyi @335b nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi @335b nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in inner and outer emptiness.🔽You should train in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in great emptiness.🔽You should train in ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned should be purified,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited should be purified,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end should be purified,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal should be purified,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence should be purified,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of all things should be purified,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of specific characteristics should be purified,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension should be purified,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence should be purified,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence should be purified,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “You should train in the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the four legs of miraculous power.🔽You should train in the five faculties.

original: stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽tshad med pa rnams @336a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // tshad med pa rnams @336a *//
translated: You should train in the meditative concentrations.

original: yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o /
translated: You should train in the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: “You should train in the meditative absorption of progressive abiding.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽You should train in great love.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: You should train in the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the knowledge of all modes should be purified;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: the knowledge of paths should be purified;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects should be purified.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti,

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: how is it that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections

original: byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba yin /
translated: they purify the path to enlightenment?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Su­bhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a @336b radva ti'i bu /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a @336b radva ti'i bu / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,🔽there is a mundane perfection of generosity,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
translated: and there is a supramundane perfection of generosity.🔽There is a mundane perfection of ethical discipline,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
translated: and there is a supramundane perfection of ethical discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /🔽'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
translated: The perfection of patience is also mundane and also supramundane.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /🔽'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
translated: The perfection of effort is also mundane and also supramundane.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
translated: The perfection of concentration is also mundane and also supramundane.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also mundane and also supramundane.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
translated: what is the mundane perfection of generosity?

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang /
translated: What is the supramundane one?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings

original: sbyin pa byed cing sbyin bdag tu gyur pa dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa dang / ltogs pa dang / 'gron pa dang / slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas /
analyzed: sbyin pa byed cing sbyin bdag tu gyur pa dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa dang / ltogs pa dang / 'gron pa dang / slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas /
translated: They give and become benefactors to ascetics and brahmins, and to those who are destitute, hungry, thirsty, traveling, and begging for food.

original: skom 'dod pa la ni skom /🔽theg pa 'dod pa la ni theg pa /
analyzed: skom 'dod pa la ni skom / theg pa 'dod pa la ni theg pa /
translated: To those who want drink, they give drink.🔽To those who want vehicles, they give vehicles.

original: gos 'dod pa la ni gos /🔽me tog 'dod pa la ni me tog /
analyzed: gos 'dod pa la ni gos / me tog 'dod pa la ni me tog /
translated: To those who want clothes, they give clothes.🔽To those who want flowers, they give flowers.

original: phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba /🔽spos 'dod pa la ni spos /
analyzed: phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba / spos 'dod pa la ni spos /
translated: To those who want garlands, they give garlands.🔽To those who want incense, they give incense.

original: byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa /
analyzed: byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa /
translated: To those who want ointments, they give ointments.

original: gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas /
analyzed: gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas /
translated: To those who want dwellings, they give dwellings.

original: mal stan 'dod pa la ni mal stan /🔽yo byad 'dod pa la ni yo byad /
analyzed: mal stan 'dod pa la ni mal stan / yo byad 'dod pa la ni yo byad /
translated: To those who want beds, they give beds.🔽To those who want necessities, they give necessities.

original: sman 'dod pa la ni sman yongs su gtong ba nas /
analyzed: sman 'dod pa la ni sman yongs su gtong ba nas /
translated: To those who want medicine, they give medicine,🔽and so on up to

original: mi'i yo byad gzhan @337a *//🔽ci'ang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste /🔽bu pho 'dod pa la ni bu pho yongs su gtong /🔽bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo yongs su gtong /
analyzed: mi'i yo byad gzhan @337a *// ci'ang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste / bu pho 'dod pa la ni bu pho yongs su gtong / bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo yongs su gtong /
translated: any other human necessities.🔽To those who want sons, they give sons.🔽To those who want daughters, they give daughters.

original: chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma yongs su gtong /
analyzed: chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma yongs su gtong /
translated: To those who want wives, they give wives.

original: rgyal srid 'dod pa la ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong //
analyzed: rgyal srid 'dod pa la ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong //
translated: For those who want a kingdom, he gives away his kingdom.

original: mgo 'dod pa la ni mgo yongs su gtong /
analyzed: mgo 'dod pa la ni mgo yongs su gtong /
translated: For those who want a head, he gives away his head.

original: mig 'dod pa la ni mig yongs su gtong /🔽yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa la ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong /
analyzed: mig 'dod pa la ni mig yongs su gtong / yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa la ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong /
translated: For those who want eyes, he gives away his eyes.🔽For those who want limbs and fingers, he gives away his limbs and fingers.

original: sha dang khrag dang rkang 'dod pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: sha dang khrag dang rkang 'dod pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang yongs su gtong ste /
translated: For those who want flesh, blood, and marrow, he gives away his flesh, blood, and marrow.

original: de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong la /
analyzed: de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong la /
translated: And he gives while standing.

original: de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong ba'o //
translated: And he thinks, “I am giving.”
